name: Lab Dash
description:
Lab Dashh was created by one of our 2nd year Game Design Students as part of their Final Major Project. It was completed in June 2018 and took 4 months to develop. The game is a prototype and has some bugs but is completely playable and was successful in completing the brief. Jamie took on the role of Designer, artist and programmer.

Lab Dash is a first person parkour games, 

All aspect of the game was created by the students as part of their coursework for Level 3 Game Design at Priestley College Warrington UK

#level3notdegree
